FuncDef: This command specifies the CHILD_SA. If theinheritparameter is specified, then the system uses the IPsec lifetime configuration in the corresponding IKE policy configured in the same IPsec gateway or IPsec tunnel.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the lifetime of the Phase 2 IKE key in seconds. Values-1200 to 31536000.
Specifies that the system uses the ipsec-lifetime configuration in the corresponding IKE policy that is configured for the same IPsec gateway or IPsec tunnel.
